content:
IWithLoadBalancingRule Interface

Definition

The stage of the load balancer update allowing to add, remove or modify load balancing rules.

In this Article

public interface IWithLoadBalancingRule

Methods

DefineLoadBalancingRule(String)

Begins the definition of a new load balancing rule to add to the load balancer. The definition must be completed with a call to LoadBalancerTcpProbe.DefinitionStages.WithAttach.attach().
UpdateLoadBalancingRule(String)

Begins the description of an update to an existing load balancing rule on this load balancer.
WithLoadBalancingRule(Int32, TransportProtocol)

Adds a load balancing rule for the specified port and protocol. The new rule will be created under the name "default".
WithLoadBalancingRule(Int32, TransportProtocol, Int32)

Adds a load balancing rule between the specified front end and back end ports and protocol. The new rule will be created under the name "default".
WithoutLoadBalancingRule(String)

Removes the specified load balancing rule from the load balancer, if present.
